Invocation Name: my medicine man
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use this skill for your daily reminders so you and your loved ones are more assured of your medication routines. Say "Alexa, ask My Medicine Man", it will tell you if you have any reminder pending. If there is one when you check, you know it’s time to take your meds. 

After you have taken your meds, just tell Alexa to "cancel now" or "I got it" to remove the reminder. CareRinger will know not to call to remind you this time.

Let CareRinger schedule your daily reminder for you, or use the Amazon routine to program your daily routine yourself. To schedule a reminder call, just say "Alexa, ask my medicine man to set a reminder for 2 hours" or "remind me in 30 minutes". CareRinger will call to remind you, and let your trusted contact know if the call is not answered. For more information about customizing your routine, please refer to the Amazon documentation.

Half the people in the U.S. do not take their meds properly. According to Dr. B. Chan, my nephew: "Most of us have difficulty starting new medications, particularly those requiring taking them at certain times of day or multiple times per day - this requires developing new habits and routines." The "My Medicine Man" skill simply helps you build these habits to improve your health. 

To begin, you need to register for the CareRinger service. For information about CareRinger and details to complete the sign-up forms, please visit www.careringer.com, or you can contact support@careringer.com for assistance. 
To enable the "My Medicine Man" skill, you must link the skill to your CareRinger account. When asked, you must provide the CareRinger participants' phone numbers in the CareRinger sign-up form for the service.

Examples:
“Alexa, ask my medicine man”. 
– To check for your reminder status
“Alexa, ask my medicine man to add a reminder for 3 hours.” 
- To set up a new reminder
“Alexa, ask my medicine man to remind me in 30 minutes” 
- To set a new reminder for 30 minutes
“Alexa, ask my medicine man to cancel now” 
- To remove any pending reminder
